```{r}
indo_gtsummary <- indo_rct |>
  mutate(
    across(
      where(is.factor), 
      \(.x) as.character(.x) |> 
        str_replace(".+_(.+)", "\\1"))
  ) |> 
  select(-id) |> 
  tbl_summary(by = "rx")

indo_gtsummary
```

```{r}
indo_clean <- indo_rct |>
  mutate(
    across(
      where(is.factor), 
      \(.x) as.character(.x) |> 
        str_replace(".+_(.+)", "\\1"))
  ) |> 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = -c(id, age, risk, bleed, outcome),
    names_to = "colname",
    values_to = "value"
  ) |> 
  group_by(id) |> 
  mutate(rx = ifelse(colname == "rx", value, NA)) |> 
  fill(rx, .direction = 'downup') |> 
  ungroup() |> 
  filter(colname != "rx") |> 
  count(rx, colname, value, outcome) |> 
  add_count(rx, colname, wt = n, name = "total") |> 
  mutate(
    pct = round(n/total,3),
    n = NULL,
    total = NULL
  ) |> 
  pivot_wider(names_from = "rx",
              values_from = pct)

indo_clean |> 
  gt() |> 
  fmt_percent(columns = c(indomethacin, placebo)) |> 
  opt_interactive(
    page_size_default = 100,
    use_sorting = TRUE,
    use_search = TRUE,
    use_filters = TRUE
  )

```
